column.name: user_id
column.remarks: The id of the user, fk to users.user_id

column.name: access_token_token
column.remarks: The JSON web token of the access token

column.name: access_token_type
column.remarks: The type of the access token

column.name: access_token_subject
column.remarks: The subject of the access token

column.name: access_token_claims
column.remarks: The claims of the access token stored as JSON

column.name: access_token_issued
column.remarks: Issued date of the access token

column.name: access_token_expiration
column.remarks: Expiration date of the access token

column.name: refresh_token_token
column.remarks: The JSON web token of the refresh token

column.name: refresh_token_type
column.remarks: The type of the refresh token

column.name: refresh_token_subject
column.remarks: The subject of the refresh token

column.name: refresh_token_claims
column.remarks: The claims of the refresh token stored as JSON

column.name: refresh_token_issued
column.remarks: Issued date of the refresh token

column.name: refresh_token_expiration
column.remarks: Expiration date of the refresh token

changeSet.comment: Creates the Jwt authentication table with columns id, user_id, access_token and refresh_token Creates the foreign key with user table
